mapper.select: SELECT um.`id` AS authorId, um.`avatar`, um.`nickname`, aab.`content`, aab.`id` AS contentId, aa.`category`, aa.`comment_counts`, aa.`gmt_create`, aa.`tag`, aa.`id`, aa.`summary`, aa.`title`, aa.`view_counts`, aa.`weight` FROM atai_article aa, ucenter_member um, atai_article_body aab WHERE aa.`id` = #{id} AND aa.`author_id` = um.`id` AND aa.`body_id` = aab.`id`
